name: MM&M Awards
eligibility: work that ran between April 9, 2021 and April 20, 2022
notes: Qualifying campaigns must have been active for at least part of the eligibility period but need not necessarily have been launched during this time frame nor have run for the entirety of this window. The product launch eligibility period runs from January 1, 2021, to April 20, 2022.
